Server

https://nuxt.com/docs/guide/directory-structure/server
Nuxt.,,,.
/server ,.

server/API.

Nuxt,API,,.
:server/api,server/routes,server/middleware

text
-| server/
---| api/
-----| hello.ts      # /api/hello
---| routes/
-----| bonjour.ts    # /bonjour
---| middleware/
-----| log.ts        # log all requests

defineEventHandler()eventHandler()().
**JSON,Promise,event.node.res.end()**.

ts
//server/api/hello.ts
export default defineEventHandler((event) => {
    return {
        hello:'world'
    }
});

:

vue
<script setup lang='ts'>
    const { data } = await useFetch('/api/hello');
</script>
<template>
    <pre>{{ data }}</pre>
</template>

~/server/api,,/api.
,~/server/routes.

ts
// server/routes/hello.ts
export default defineEventHandler(() => 'Hello World');

/hello,localhost:3000/hello,'Hello World'.

TIP

,pages,.

Nuxt~/server/middleware,.
,,,,.(,.)

TIP

,,,,.(?)

ts
//server/middleware/log.ts
export default defineEventHandler((e) => {
    console.log('New Request:' + getRequestURL(event));
});
ts
// server/middleware/auth.ts
export default defineEventHandler((e) => {
    event.context.auth = { user:123}
})

,~/server/pluginsNitro.Nitro,Nitro.

ts
// server/plugins/nitroPlugin.ts
export default defineNitroPlugin((nitroApp) => {
    console.log('Nitro plugin', nitroApp);
})

TIP

Nitro.

unjs/h3,.
~/server/utils.
,.

ts
// server/utils/handler.ts
import type { EventHandler, EventHandlerRequest } from 'h3'

export const defineWrappedResponseHandler = <T extends EventHandlerRequest, D> (
  handler: EventHandler<T, D>
): EventHandler<T, D> =>
  defineEventHandler<T>(async event => {
    try {
      // do something before the route handler
      const response = await handler(event)
      // do something after the route handler
      return { response }
    } catch (err) {
      // Error handling
      return { err }
    }
  })

middleware? ?,middlewarehandler wrapper?

WARNING

Nuxt>=3.5.clone,

IDE'nitro''vue',,~/server/tsconfig.json:

json
{
    "extends":"../.nuxt/tsconfig.server.json"
}

nuxi typecheck,IDE.

,.
/api/hello/[name].ts,event.context.params[name].

ts
// server/api/hello/[name.ts]
export default defineEventHandler(e => {
    const name = getRouterParam(event,'name'); //??? composables?!
    return `Hello `${name}!`
})

getValidateRouterParams,Zod(???)

localhost:3000/api/hello/nuxt, Hello Nuxt!.

(/api/routes).
.get,.post,.put,.delete. (?4.5??)

ts
//server/api/test.get.ts
export default defineEventHandler(() => 'Test get handler')
ts
//server/api/test.post.ts
export default defineEventHandler(() => 'Test post handler')

/api/test,,:GET'Test get handler',POST'Test post handler'. ,405.

**index.[method].ts,,.**.

text
-| server/
---| api/
-----| foo/     
-------| index.get.ts      
-------| index.post.ts      
-------| index.delete.ts

,.
[...].ts,/api/foo/bar/baz,:

ts
// server/api/foo/[...].ts
export default defineEventHandler((e) => {
    // -> /api/foo/bar/baz 
    const fullPath = e.context.path;
    //  -> bar/baz
    const unmatched = e.context.params._;  //
    return `Default foo handler`
})

,,: [...slug].ts

ts
// server/api/foo/[...slug].ts
export default defineEventHandler(e => {
   const unmatched = e.context.params.slug; 
   return `Default foo handler`; 
})

ts
// server/api/submit.post.ts
export default defineEventHandler(async(e) => {
  const body = await readBody(e);
  return { body }
})

:

vue
<script setup lang='ts'>
async function submit(){
  const { body } = $fetch('/api/submit',{
    method:'post',
    body:{test:123}
  })
} 
</script>

INFO

POSTbody,GETbody().readBody405

:/api/query?foo=bar&baz=qux,:

ts
export default defineEventHandler((e) => {
  const query = getQuery(e);
  return {a:query.bar, b:query.baz}
})

200 OK.
500 Internal Server Error.
,,createError():

ts
// server/api/validation/[id].ts
export default defineEventHandler(e => {
  const id = parseInt(e.context.params.id) as number;
  if(!Number.isInteger(id)){
    throw createError({
      statusCode:400,
      statusMessage:'ID should be an integer'
    })
  }
  return 'All good'
})

setResponseStatus.ex

ts
export default defineEventHandler(e => {
  setResponseStatus(e,202)
})

()

ts
export default defineEventHandler(async (e) => {
  const config = useRuntimeConfig(e);

  const repo = await fetch('https://api.github.com/repos/nuxt/nuxt',{
    headers:{
      Authorization: `token ${config.githubToken}`
    }
  });
  return repo;
})
ts
export default defineNuxtConfig({
  runtimeConfig:{
    githubToken:''
  }
})
text
NUXT_GITHUB_TOKEN='<my-super-token>'

Cookies

ts
// server/api/cookies.ts
export default defineEventHandler(e => {
  const cookies = parseCookies(e);
  return {
    cookies
  }
})

Nitro

nuxt.confignitro(,)

WARNING

.:Nitro,,,.

ts
//nuxt.config.ts
export default defineNuxtConfig({
  nitro:{
    //...blablablah
  }
})

express,,useBase:

ts
// server/api/hello/[...slug].ts
import { createRouter, defineEventHandler, useBase } from 'h3';

const router = createRouter();
router.get('/test',defineEventHandler(e => 'Hello World'));

export default useBase('/api/hello',router.handler);  //handler?!?
///api/hello/test

ts
import fs from 'node/fs';
import { sendStream } from 'h3';

export default defineEventHandler(e => {
  return sendStream(e, fs.createReadStream('/path/to/file')); // ??????PostPreview!?!?
})

ts
// server/api/foo.get.ts
export default defineEventHandler(async(e) => {
  await sendRedirect(e,'/path/redirect/to',302); //??? sendRedirectAPI???
})

,node,//:

ts
//server/api/legacy.ts
export default fromNodeMiddleWare((req,res) => {
  res.end('Legacy handler'); // express
})
ts
// server/middleware/legacy.ts
export default fromNodeMiddleWare((req,res,next) => {
  console.log('Legacy middleware');
  next(); //
})

WARNING

asyncPromisenext().

Nitro.(??storage mount point,),nitro.storage:

ts
export default defineNuxtConfig({
  nitro:{
    storage:{
      redis: {
        driver: 'redis',
        /* redis connector options */
        port: 6379, // Redis port
        host: "127.0.0.1", // Redis host
        username: "", // needs Redis >= 6
        password: "",
        db: 0, // Defaults to 0
        tls: {} // tls/ssl
      }
    }
  }
})

API:

ts
// server/api/storage/test.ts
export default defineEventHandler(async(e) => {
  const key = await useStorage('redis').getKeys();  //? useStorage?
  await useStorage('redis').setItem('foo','bar');
  await useStorage('redis').removeItem('foo');

  return {}
})

Nitro,,:

ts
import redisDriver from 'unstorage/drivers/redis';

export default defineNitroPlugin(() => {
  const storage = useStorage();

   // Dynamically pass in credentials from runtime configuration, or other sources
  const driver = redisDriver({
      base: 'redis',
      host: useRuntimeConfig().redis.host,
      port: useRuntimeConfig().redis.port,
      /* other redis connector options */
    })

  // Mount driver
  storage.mount('redis', driver)
})
ts
export default defineNuxtConfig({
  runtimeConfig:{
    redis:{
      host:'',
      port:0,
      /* other redis connector options */
    }
  }
})
